headline: APA Corporation: Strong Pick In Oil/Gas, With A Reversing Chart Pattern
summary: APA Corporation is trading at recession-like valuation levels, with ultra-low price-to-sales and cash flow ratios rarely seen outside crisis periods. See why the stock is a Buy.
